basics.name: Waqas Ahmed
basics.label: Full Stack Software Engineer | I create end-to-end software applications using MEAN/LAMP Stack | Web Developer
basics.summary:
Hands-on developing mobile and web applications using the latest, trending and greatest technologies, including:

* MEAN-stack single-page apps: Node, Express, Angular, MongoDB.
* AngularJS: separately used as and where required.
* LAMP-stack web sites: Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP.
* Bootstrap, Zurb (foundation): Responsive web design to support desktop PCs, tablets, and mobile devices.
* REST API: Restify/Express, Mongoose, MongoDB
* Android apps: Cordova, Angular, Ionic.
* Cloud services: Openshift, Heroku, Windows Azure.
* Reporting and analytics.
* Gamification, multi-platform, multi-lingual, and fully scalable applications development.
* The Essentials: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery
* CMS: Wordpress, Sitefinity, Kentico

My additional expertise lies in:

C#, ASP.NET, Oracle, Adobe Flex, MSSQL Server
XML, Web Services, Windows Services

A versatile individual who is Software Engineer by profession having over 4 years of full-time multi-disciplinary industry experience. An instant learner who is always keen to dive into latest technologies and implement them as required and beneficial.

Having passion and long-term vision to have the power of both the worlds (front-end and back-end), I worked towards the direction and became Full Stack Software Engineer. In my day to day job, I am engaged in high quality end-to-end applications development, that includes architecting, coding, implementing and maintaining responsive, robust and state-of-the-art modern applications.

Though I have diverse experience in using technologies such as .NET, PHP and Flex, I am on the path to be an expert in MEAN stack and its various development forms in different scenarios.

With an ultimate goal to become successful in here and hereafter, I seek knowledge of both the worlds and implement them in my life and for the betterment of society whether in terms of personal or professional.

profiles.username: This Resume is built from this Github Repo

work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scores™ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
highlights: Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copy right infringement laws
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores
